ComicInfo.Title: Mr. Monster's Hi-Shock Schlock
ComicInfo.Summary: More reprints from comics, these being noted for their cheese factor. Three page opening with Mr. Monster Toni Gay & Butch Dykeman from Popular Teen-Ages Jumpin' Jupiter by Basil Wolverton The Eye Sees
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-02 23:17:38. [CVDB224655] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 20:11:23. [Issue ID 42838]
